subtitle.line1: 隐私是一项基本人权。 不必多说。在Internxt，我们相信，人类能够实现的目标是不寻常的
subtitle.line2: 所取得的成就是不平凡的，而我们的产品应该使社会实现卓越。我们的云服务
subtitle.line3: 不仅要赋予人们权力，还必须尊重基本的个人权利。我们正在努力建立一个更好、更安全的互联网，其核心是尊重用户。
subtitle.line4: 设计安全, 默认隐私。
subtitle.line5: 今天就开始使用Internxt Drive，这是一个安全的、私有的、分布式的、开源的、加密的、免费的云存储服务。

subtitle.line1: Today the Internet is controlled by technology giants that offer services and products that
subtitle.line2: are a means to an end. Services that have become essential in our lives and are used to collect
subtitle.line3: data from users to better profile them, as they live off advertising. Privacy should not have
subtitle.line4: such a high cost. We believe in a more ethical internet, where user privacy is at its core.

section1.signature: Fran Villalba Segarra, Internxt创始人兼CEO

securitum.title: Internxt Successfully Passes Independent Security Audit
securitum.subtitle: Read the complete security audit reports:

subtitle.line1: 我们非常重视隐私和安全，这就是为什么我们已经实施了一系列的技术
subtitle.line2: 和协议，以确保您的数据始终是安全和保密的。

square1.title: 军用级加密
square1.description: 我们非常重视你的隐私，这就是为什么你的文件是加密的，只有你能访问你的文件。

square2.title: 零知识技术
square2.description: 在任何时候，文件、照片、密码或任何种类的未加密原始数据都不会被未经授权的用户或服务器看到。你总是完全控制着谁可以访问。

square3.title: 符合 GDPR 的同步
square3.description: 我们现在遵守 GDPR 的所有条款，例如隐私权、信息权和被遗忘权等，并承诺满足所有未来条款。

square4.title: 端到端加密
square4.description: 您使用 Internxt 存储的所有数据均经过 AES-256 端到端加密。 这意味着即使是一个小文件，世界上最强大的处理器也需要宇宙年龄的两倍才能解密。

title.line1: 旨在保护您的信息的应用程序

subtitle.line1: 来自大型科技公司的免费产品并非真正免费，您需要支付个人数据费用。
subtitle.line2: 我们的产品绝不会翻动您的信息或出售您的数据。 当我们说免费时，我们是认真的。

square1.title: 云盘让您选择要存储和共享的内容
square1.description: 照片 不会访问您的个人数据或文件，而是从头开始设计，让您重新控制您的文件并保护您免受数据收集者和广告公司的侵害。 保护您的存储。

square2.title: 使用照片，隐私始终是焦点
square2.description: 照片 旨在帮助您保持最完美时刻的同步图库，而不必担心您的隐私和数据突然丢失。 回忆备份，安然无恙。
square2.cta: 同步你的照片和纪念物

square3.title: Send with absolute certainty.
square3.description: Send allows you to encrypt and share large files fast without worrying about the security of your documents, images, or videos. Transfer to anyone in total confidentiality.

faq.question: Is Internxt’s cloud storage secure?
answer: Internxt Drive is a zero-knowledge file storage service that's built for absolute privacy and strict security. Our service doesn't access your personal data or files for ad purposes, instead is designed to give you back control over your files and protect you from data collection and advertising companies.

faq.question: What is the most private cloud storage?
answer: Many cloud providers say their service is private, but Internxt goes a step above and beyond. Internxt is a zero-knowledge file storage service that’s built for absolute privacy and strict security. Internxt cannot access your data stored in the cloud storage.

faq.question: Is Internxt private?
answer: Unlike some of our competitors, we don't operate based on advertising or data collection. Your data is exclusively yours. We prioritize your security, privacy, and the security of your file and photos. Using Internxt, you can be sure you're secure.
